SubmitTestEvent.LongDescription: The 8.1.3 and 7.2.1 Assertions dont check to see that the event is delivered but they will verify SubmitTestEvent against Subscription creation
SubmitTestEvent.Description: set the properties for the SubmitTestEvent action here

Subscription.LongDescription: The 8.1.3 and 7.2.1 Assertions dont check to see that the event is delivered but they will verify SubmitTestEvent against Subscription creation
Subscription.Description: set the URL for your Client Event handler and related properties here. Properties set thru: http://redfish.dmtf.org/schemas/v1/EventDestination_v1.xml

RedfishServiceCheckTool_SUTConfiguration.Description: setup your server (SUT) location/authorization information here:  AllowAction_LogServiceClearLog = yes will allow this Action during test

ClientProxy.Description: setup your client proxy here or set the entries to 'none' if its not needed to get outside a firewall to the Schema Repository URL

DMTF_SPMFSchemas.LongDescription: if RetrieveDMTFSchemas is set to 'no' then the tool expects that the scema files are already in LocalSchemaDirectoryFolder
DMTF_SPMFSchemas.Description: Set RetreiveDMTFSchemas to 'yes' to download the schema files from Schema Repository URL (current) to LocalSchemaDirectoryFolder

RedfishServiceCheckTool_SchemaFiles.Description: Path of folder containing schema files ('json-schema/' and 'metadata/' expected within redfish-1.0.0), place in the same directory as scripts
